title: Cyclistic Customer Analysis
text:
Analysis


Code
basic <- bike_rides %>%
  group_by(user_bike, month) %>%
  summarise(
    rides = n(),
    duration = median(as.numeric(ride_time, units = "minutes"))
  )

basic %>%
  ggplot(aes(month, rides, group = user_bike, colour = user_bike)) +
  geom_line() +
  scale_y_continuous(
    breaks = scales::breaks_width(50000),
    labels = scales::label_comma()
  ) +
  labs(
    x = "Month",
    y = "Rides per month",
    colour = "Segment"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()





Figure 4: Rides per month by market segment






Code
basic %>%
  ggplot(
    aes(
      month, duration,
      group = user_bike,
      colour = user_bike
    )
  ) +
  geom_line() +
  ylim(0, 30.5) +
  labs(
    x = "Month",
    y = "Median ride duration in minutes",
    colour = "Segment"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()





Figure 5: Median ride duration by market segment
